row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_WINDOWS.PRV.INCLUDE.STR2VAR "UC4RB_TEXT"="UC4RB_PORTS_LIST" :SET &PORTS_CHECK#="" :SET &PORT_CHECK_RESULT# ="" :SET &NO_IP#=0 :SET &HND#=PREP_PROCESS_VAR(UC4_RV.WI_CMD.RET_STR2VAR) :PROCESS &HND# : SET &VAL#=GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2) : SET &VAL# = STR_TRIM(&VAL#) : SET &PORTS_CHECK# = STR_CAT(&PORTS_CHECK#, &VAL#) : SET &PORTS_CHECK# = STR_CAT(&PORTS_CHECK#, ",") : SET &RET#=STR_FIND(&VAL#,":") : IF &RET# = 0 : SET &NO_IP#=1 : ELSE : SET &NO_IP#=0 : ENDIF : SET &HND2# = PREP_PROCESS_VAR(PCK.AUTOMIC_WINDOWS.PRV.VARA.NETSTAT_LOCAL) : PROCESS &HND2# : SET &IP_ADDR#=GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND2#,2) : IF &NO_IP# = 1 : SET &COL_POS#=STR_FIND(&IP_ADDR#,":") : IF &COL_POS# <> 0 : SET &COL_POS#=ADD(&COL_POS#,1) : SET &IP_ADDR#=SUBSTR(&IP_ADDR#,&COL_POS#) : ENDIF : ENDIF : SET &IP_ADDR# = STR_TRIM(&IP_ADDR#) : IF &IP_ADDR# = &VAL# : PUT_VAR PCK.AUTOMIC_WINDOWS.PRV.VARA.PORT_CHECK_RESULT,&VAL#,1 : IF &PORT_CHECK_RESULT# = "" : SET &PORT_CHECK_RESULT# = "&VAL#" : ELSE : SET &PORT_CHECK_RESULT# = "&PORT_CHECK_RESULT#,&VAL#" : ENDIF : IF &NO_IP# = 1 : TERM_PROCESS : ENDIF : ENDIF : ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND2# :ENDPROCESS
:SET &LEN# = STR_LENGTH(&PORTS_CHECK#) :SET &LEN# = &LEN# - 1 :SET &PORTS_CHECK# = STR_CUT(&PORTS_CHECK#, 1, &LEN#)
@echo off echo Check following ports: &PORTS_CHECK# :IF &PORT_CHECK_RESULT# = "" echo All above ports are free :ELSE echo Ports are taken: &PORT_CHECK_RESULT# :ENDIF
:PSET &UC4RB_PORT_CHECK_RESULT# = &PORT_CHECK_RESULT# :SET &REMOVE_OBJECT_RET#=REMOVE_OBJECT("UC4_RV.WI_CMD.RET_STR2VAR") :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS
